body:
Using the link from the main repo readme you get redirected to http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial_sc16.html.

It recommends
```
becker33:spack$ export PATH=~/spack/bin/spack:$PATH
```
which is wrong. You need to set
```
$ export PATH=~/spack/bin:$PATH
```
I'm sorry, i haven't found a branch to edit this directly. But the information is misleading
title: Wrong $PATH extension in Tutorial
